parts.text:
```xml
<output>
<analysis>
<has-cmf>False. There is no CMF number present in the provided post information.</has-cmf>
<refers-to-candidate>True. The post refers to Mircea Geoană, who is associated with the Partidul România în Acțiune (PRA). While not explicitly stating "vote for...", the strong positive association with a candidate participating in the parliamentary elections is present.</refers-to-candidate>
<addresses-the-wide-population>True. This is a paid Facebook post, inherently designed to reach a wide audience. The link directs to a public website, further supporting this conclusion.</addresses-the-wide-population>
<electoral-objective>True. The post highlights the return of Cristian Lungu and the support of Mircea Geoană to the PRA.  This is clearly intended to create a positive image and potentially influence voters' perception of the party and its candidates, thus influencing the vote. The positive framing aims to garner support for the party.</electoral-objective>
<journalism>False. While presented as a news article, the content lacks the objectivity and neutrality expected from journalistic reporting. The focus is on promoting a specific political party and its candidates, rather than providing balanced information.</journalism>
<personal_opinion>False. The post is not expressing a personal opinion; it's promoting a political party and its associated figures. The language used is promotional, not opinionated.</personal_opinion>
</analysis>

<conclusion>
<post_id>2511869432349035</post_id>
<electoral-propaganda-analysis>
The Facebook post, paid for by "Opinii Independente," promotes Partidul România în Acțiune (PRA) by highlighting the return of Cristian Lungu and the support of Mircea Geoană.  While not explicitly calling for votes, the positive framing and association with a candidate clearly aim to influence voters' perceptions and potentially increase support for the PRA. The post's targeting parameters (age, location) further suggest an attempt to reach potential voters.  The post's content and context strongly suggest it's a form of electoral propaganda, even if indirectly.  The timing of the post, after the official campaign period, is also a crucial factor.
</electoral-propaganda-analysis>
<electoral-propaganda-decision>TRUE</electoral-propaganda-decision>
<electoral-propaganda-candidates>
  <candidate><name>Mircea Geoană</name><impact>POSITIVE</impact></candidate>
</electoral-propaganda-candidates>
<responsible-party-or-group>Opinii Independente</responsible-party-or-group>
<message-for-police>
Opinii Independente, pentru încălcarea articolului 98 t) din LEGEA nr. 208 din 20 iulie 2015, prin publicarea pe Facebook, după ora 18:00 pe 23.11.2024, a unei postări plătite (ID 2511869432349035) care promovează Partidul România în Acțiune (PRA) prin evidențierea revenirii lui Cristian Lungu și sprijinul lui Mircea Geoană, având un efect electoral clar prin crearea unei imagini pozitive și influențarea percepției alegătorilor asupra partidului și candidaților săi.  Conținutul și contextul postării, precum și parametrii de target, indică o tentativă de influențare a votului, constituind propagandă electorală, chiar dacă indirectă.  Publicarea după încheierea perioadei oficiale de campanie agravează încălcarea.
</message-for-police>
</conclusion>
</output>
```
